General.Name: Guangdong Highsun Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Highsun Group Co.,Ltd. owns and operates urban complexes for leased property operations and self-built real estate projects in China. It owns various themed shopping malls, professional wholesale markets, urban complexes, and shopping centers. The company offers intelligent warehousing and logistics services, industrial parks, cloud data, hotel services, new energy vehicles, and charging operations services. In addition, it provides Internet microfinance, financial leasing, commercial factoring, and third-party payment services. Guangdong Highsun Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
